/**
 * Module Dependencies
 */
 
var url = require('url')
 
/**
 * Export `absolute`
 */
 
module.exports = absolute
 
/**
 * Selector
 */
 
var selector = [
  'a[href]',
  'img[src]',
  'script[src]',
  'link[href]',
  'source[src]',
  'track[src]',
  'img[src]',
  'frame[src]',
  'iframe[src]'
].join(',')
 
/**
 * Checks if a given string is a valid URL
 *
 * @param {String} src
 * @return {Boolean}
 */
 
function isValidUrl (src) {
  try {
    url.parse(src)
    return true
  } catch (e) {
    return false
  }
}
 
/**
 * Change all the URLs into absolute urls
 *
 * @param {String} path
 * @param {Cheerio} $
 * @return {$}
 */
 
function absolute (path, $) {
  var parts = url.parse(path)
  var remote = parts.protocol + '//' + parts.host
  // apply <base> tag transformation
  var base = $('head').find('base')
  if (base.length === 1) {
    var href = base.attr('href')
    if (href) {
      remote = href
    }
  }
  $(selector).each(abs)
 
  function abs (i, el) {
    var $el = $(el)
    var key = null
    var src = null
 
    var hasHref = $el.attr('href')
    var hashSrc = $el.attr('src')
 
    if (hasHref) {
      key = 'href'
      src = hasHref
    } else if (hashSrc) {
      key = 'src'
      src = hashSrc
    } else {
      return
    }
 
    src = src.trim()
 
    if (~src.indexOf('://')) {
      return
    } else if (isValidUrl(src)) {
      var current
      if (href && src.indexOf('/') !== 0) {
        current = url.resolve(remote, href)
        src = url.resolve(current, src)
      } else {
        current = url.resolve(remote, parts.pathname)
        src = url.resolve(current, src)
      }
    }
 
    $el.attr(key, src)
  }
 
  return $
}
